title: Why cant i unlock this guy
body:
http://imgur.com/a/e2D8D
it says i have 3200 ip but i cant buy a 3150 ip character, do I need 3150 ip AND 790 rp to unlock him

replies.body: Your IP balance doesn't seem to be sync'd properly, and is showing an inaccurate amount.  Check your balance again when you have a chance and let me know if it's been updated, or try the legacy client as well.  Let me know!

No, it's probably just a bug with the new client. Be patient, you should be able to purchase him soon enough.

(This is just what I think, you can still wait for officall answers if you'd like)
